title: In need of Arduino and Sensors
content:
Hello everyone, I am in need of arduino ans sensors, i have talked to few senions who told to go to SP road and there you will get the parts for really cheap. I did do there this week-end but it was crossing my budget(at the start i want to explore the domain of robotics, then invest if i like it), If anyone wants to sell these parts do let me know. Thank-you.  


Things i need, arduino, Sensors, jumping cables, breadboard, motors, and anything u have related to this domain.

comments.body:
My suggestion would be 

1. SP road 
2. [https://robu.in/](https://robu.in/)
3. amazon
4. borrow from hardware lab
